queries.name: Software Engineer Positions
queries.query: site:jobs.greenhouse.io OR site:jobs.lever.co OR site:jobs.ashbyhq.com "Software Engineer"

queries.name: Software Developer Positions
queries.query: site:jobs.greenhouse.io OR site:jobs.lever.co OR site:jobs.ashbyhq.com "Software Developer"

queries.name: Full Stack Developer
queries.query: site:jobs.greenhouse.io OR site:jobs.lever.co OR site:jobs.ashbyhq.com "Full Stack Developer" OR "Full-Stack Engineer"

queries.name: Frontend Developer
queries.query: site:jobs.greenhouse.io OR site:jobs.lever.co OR site:jobs.ashbyhq.com "Frontend Developer" OR "Front End Engineer"

queries.name: Backend Developer
queries.query: site:jobs.greenhouse.io OR site:jobs.lever.co OR site:jobs.ashbyhq.com "Backend Developer" OR "Back End Engineer"
